name: MultiDrive
tagline: Free disk cloning, backup and erasing software
description: MultiDrive is a free Windows tool that lets you clone, back up, and securely wipe entire drives. Use a simple GUI or a powerful CLI ‚Äî whatever fits your workflow. Move to a new PC by cloning your drive, back up your data to avoid loss, and safely wipe a disk before selling it.

name: SciSpace BioMed Agent
tagline: Your AI Co-Scientist for Biomedical Research
description: SciSpace BioMed is a domain-native AI Agent for biomedical research. Leveraging 150+ tools & 100+ academic databases/software, it analyzes datasets, interprets variants, designs cloning, wet-lab workflows, aids rare-disease and therapeutic discovery, giving actionable insights across biology, medicine, and genomics.

name: ACE Studio 2.0
tagline: The all-in-one AI music canvas
description: ACE Studio 2.0 is an AI-first music workstation that brings a whole lineup of AI models into one smooth workflow, from vocals and instruments to full-song generation and beyond, so a single creator can work like a full team from first idea to final release.

name: Marble
tagline: Super simple headless CMS
description: A simple, collaborative CMS for publishing articles, changelogs, and product updates. Designed to help you ship content faster!

name: RightNow
tagline: AI code editor for GPU kernel development
description: RightNow AI is the first GPU-native code editor supporting CUDA, Triton, CUTE, and Tilelang. Features agentic hardware-aware AI (Forge), cycle-accurate GPU emulator with 98% accuracy across 86+ NVIDIA architectures, real-time profiling with Nsight Compute integration, and line-by-line performance analysis. Write, optimize, and profile GPU kernels in any DSL, all in one editor. Supports all NVIDIA GPUs Free to download with pro features available.

name: CUDA 13.1
tagline: The biggest CUDA expansion since 2006
description: NVIDIA CUDA 13.1 introduces the largest and most comprehensive update to the CUDA platform since it was invented two decades ago.

name: BrickVault
tagline: Your professional LEGO portfolio tracking app
description: BrickVault is the ultimate LEGO portfolio tracking app for collectors and investors. Track your LEGO sets, monitor values, and manage your collection with professional-grade tools. Free to use, mobile-optimized, and built for serious LEGO enthusiasts.

name: Browser Buddy
tagline: An AI buddy that finds you thoughtful quotes and essays
description: Browser Buddy is an AI buddy that curates a feed of thoughtful quotes and essays based on your interests. Ask your buddy for something practical like "how to find my first users", explore rabbit holes like "the history of the internet", or learn about "sustainable urban design" to impress your next date. Start curating your information diet today so you'll always have a feed of wonderful words to read and interesting ideas to talk about.

name: Beanvest Quality Investing
tagline: AI Stock research focused on high-quality companies
description: Beanvest is a research platform for quality investing, helping you identify the best companies in the world following a Quality Investing strategy and buying them at a fair price.

name: BrowserBook
tagline: The Browser Automation IDE
description: BrowserBook is an AI-powered IDE for building fast, reliable browser automations. It pairs a Jupyter-style notebook with a context-aware AI coding assistant and an inline browser, enabling developers to write, test, and debug automations all in one place. With built-in auth management, data extraction, screenshot tools, and API deployment, you can go from idea to production-ready automation in minutes, not hours.

name: Murror AI
tagline: AI to help battle loneliness and build relationships
description: üß† AI Reflections ‚Äî Clear, multi-angle insights on your feelings. ‚úçÔ∏è Guided Prompts ‚Äî For stress, relationships, self-love, and more. üìä Emotional Patterns ‚Äî Spot recurring emotions and root causes. üîê Encrypted Writing ‚Äî Your journaling stays private. üë• Connection Tools ‚Äî Communicate and understand others better. üå± Daily Lessons ‚Äî Quick boosts in emotional intelligence.

name: Papr
tagline: Predictive memory and context intelligence API for AI Agents
description: Ranked #1 on Stanford‚Äôs STaRK benchmark with 91%+ retrieval accuracy and fast at under 100ms, Papr unifies RAG + memory in one API that reduces AI hallucinations and powers personalized agents. Papr‚Äôs predictive engine links and structures context into a vector index + knowledge graph you can query with GraphQL or natural language‚Äîgreat for agents and analytics UIs. With built-in ACLs and permission controls, data stays private and multi-tenant. Available in open-source or cloud edition.

name: AdeptDev
tagline: Lightweight project management for founders.
description: Meet Adeptdev ‚Äî a lightweight, developer-first project manager built for solo front-end builders. I built this because every existing tool felt bloated, slow, or designed for huge teams. Adeptdev keeps things simple: fast Kanban, clean tasks, GitHub integration, and a workspace that helps you ship ‚Äî not get buried in menus. If you're a solo dev or small team that wants something modern, simple, and actually pleasant to use, give it a spin üôå

name: Shelfinder
tagline: A floating shelf for drag-and-drop files on macOS
description: Shelfinder app is a floating shelf for macOS that lets you collect, pin, and move files instantly. Looks native. Works instantly.

name: Jsfxr Pro
tagline: 8-Bit retro sound fx generator
description: Retro 8-bit sound effects generator for devs & musicians, built the popular open-source jsfxr (10k+ monthly visitors). **Key features:** - **Sound Packs** - Organize by project, download ZIP - **Cloud Sync** - Access from any device - **Multiple Formats** - WAV, MP3, OGG, SFXR - **Unlimited Undo/Redo** - **JSON Editor** - Precise control, copy/paste - **Privacy-First** - No ads / trackers - **Dark Mode** pixel art UI Perfect for jams and indie devs using Unity, Godot, GameMaker, or Unreal.

name: Draftly
tagline: Turn plain English into editable UI components & designs
description: Simply describe your idea, and get every screen of your application designed instantly from onboarding to checkout, with complete user flows for both web and mobile.

name: CirtusAI
tagline: The Universal Identity & Asset Wallet for the AI Era.
description: Don't let AI platforms lock in your data. Cirtus gives you a portable identity vault containing your emails, accounts, and assets. Use it to log in anywhere, keeping your real identity private and your assets secure and grant AI autonomy to unlock its potential.

name: Denise AI Receptionist
tagline: AI that handles calls & captures leads so you don't have to.
description: Denise is an AI receptionist built for small business and answers calls with a natural, human-like touch. Setup is simple: Choose from 6 voices and 4 tone styles, control how Denise responds, and sync with 8000+ apps via Zapier. With 24/7 and multiple call handling, Denise ensures you save time on admin and never miss a call again.

name: Mention Network
tagline: Check your website's AI visibility
description: Understand and control how your brand appears in AI answers. Powered by genuine AI conversations that capture the exact language and context real consumers use, not API-based responses. 2M+ prompts analyzed. 20K+ global data contributors. 1K+ brands evaluated. Start free today.

name: ConvoHunter
tagline: Find high-intent leads across Reddit, X, and LinkedIn
description: We monitor Reddit, X, LinkedIn and more in real time to find the conversations with real buyer intent, so you can join, help, and convert. Increase your online presence effortlesly.
